content: **sizing info ** finished garment measures 37 44 5 51 5 to fit busts 32 -34 36 -38 40 -42 **skill level ** intermediate **gauge ** 9 stitches = 2 inches 7 row = 3 inches **yarn information** * 6 6 8 balls #16 terra-cotta a * 4 4 6 balls #1478 gold b * 4 5 7 balls #1556 periwinkle c * 4 5 7 balls #3 purple d * 4 5 7 balls #1350 winter white e * 4 5 7 balls #11 moss f **other material required** * tapestry needle * stitch markers * six 7/8-inch buttons originally published in *simplicity with style sweaters* 2004 free-crochet 1 1 https //www free-crochet com/crochet_clothes/weekender_jacket/
